snippet: Former Senator Alan K. Simpson is among about 20 people who signed a brief to be sent to a federal appeals court that is hearing appeals from Utah and Oklahoma to reinstate restrictive marriage laws.
abstract: Former Wyoming Sen Alan K Simpson is among group of Western-state Republicans who are entering the battle in favor of same-sex marriage, urging a federal appeals court to declare gay marriage bans in Utah and Oklahoma unconstitutional.
lead_paragraph: Former Senator Alan K. Simpson is among about 20 people who signed a brief to be sent to a federal appeals court that is hearing appeals from Utah and Oklahoma to reinstate restrictive marriage laws.

headline.main: Republicans From the West Give Support for Gay Marriage
headline.print_headline: Republicans From West Join Action on Marriage

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
